news.logo_name: Justia Client Miller & Zois Wins Inaugural Maryland State Bar Website Award
news.description: The Maryland State Bar presented Justia website client Miller & Zois with the inaugural Zenith Award for excellence in online legal marketing. The firm’s use of “Call to Actions” on its website impressed the Bar’s Law Office Management Assistance Office.
Jules Haas quoted in New York Post regarding Renoir masterpiece involved in estate feud.
